And ours is to make your wishes come TRUE – in unprecedented,flavour-packed, deliciously delightful ways!Why?… because what you like is more important than printed menus.… because you have a million moods and there should always be food to match.… because grillin' is not a way of cooking food, it's a way of life.… because taste counts; and you matter.

name: Ebony Restaurant
description: It does not get more romantic than this. An al fresco restaurant perched 200 feet high among the clouds, lit by a canopy of stars and with the beautiful garden city of Bangalore spread at its feet....Ebony had been wow-ing clientele for more than two decades with its eclectic mix of cuisines, un-obtrusive service and unsurpassable setting. Sitting on the 13th floor of Barton Centre on M G Road, the restaurant serves an unusual mix of Pan - Indian and Parsee classics, with a few European and South Asian favourites thrown in for good measure. Ebony celebrates food that is unpretentious in nature, timeless in its appeal and needless to say prepared to ellipse all other senses. With an extensive cocktail menu and a vast number of seating options the restaurant is an ideal choice of an intimate diner, a family gathering or even a corporate celebration. Ample reserved parking for more than 70 cars for dinner means you never have that sticky decision to make. Dinners at Ebony are a la carte, but with a host of custom designed set-course menus to choose from, planning a memorable evening out within a budget was never so easy. Lunches at Ebony between Monday and Friday are the VFM (Value for Money) Executive Lunch buffets. The best of our Indian, Asian and European selections in a buffet spread featuring close to 18 dishes in 4 courses. And all this for an unbeatable price of Rs.395.00 plus taxes and levies. Saturday's are our World on Plate Buffet featuring a truly expansive 5 course buffet with many signature dishes from our Indian, Tandoor, Parsee, European and Asian repertoire. This truly One Size Fits all buffet has something in it for all tastes and all appetites. And at Rs.495.00 plus taxes and levies, there is no better way to kick start your weekend.
localAddress: 84 Hotel Ivory Tower The Penthouse Floor Mg Road, 560001

name: Vanamo
description:
Ready for an expedition of international tastes? 

Rare. Fresh. Pure. We present to you a passport to a world of taste sensations. Freshly Made Global Cuisine  Meets Artisanal Coffee.

In the heart of Indiranagar, Vanamo is a culinary sanctuary where artisanal coffee meets freshly made global cuisine. 

Vanamo is an expedition of artisanal flavours carefully curated from across the world. Be it from the back streets of Korea to the upper echelons of France, or maybe even be laced with the rich heritage of Turkish food culture. You name a country, and we may just be able to teleport you in an instant! However, great food is incomplete without great beverages, and we went out to bring the planet’s richest flavoured coffees to your tables. Close your eyes and indulge in sinful crafted single-origin coffee from Ethiopia and Columbia, and our speciality grounded coffees blend in the world's most artistic coffee machine.
localAddress: #368, Hal 2nd Stage, 100 Feet Road, Indira Nagar, 560008

name: The Lantern
cuisine: Chinese Asian Cantonese Szechuan Shanghai Hong Kong
description: The Lantern is recognized amongst Asia Pacific's Top 75 Restaurants for the previous three years running. This award-winning fine dining restaurant celebrates the rich culinary heritage of Cantonese cuisine. A meticulously curated menu by our International Master Chefs feature specialty dim sums, authentic Chinese delicacies complemented with Asian inspired cocktails. The alfresco seating surrounded by lush foliage and water bodies presents a serene getaway in the bustling city. Resembling a Chinese lantern, the restaurant's unique dining and lifestyle experiences explore diverse aspects of the world-famous Chinese cuisine. Two levels of indoor seating are characterized by rich hardwoods and stately granites. Exotic textiles and porcelain vessels line the walls and recessed lighting bathes each table in a warm luminescence. Enjoy benefits the moment you join Marriott Bonvoy Rewards Program. Earn and redeem Marriott Bonvoy points every time you dine with us.
localAddress: Residency Road, The Ritz-Carlton, 560025

name: Arbor Brewing Company - Brewpub & Eatery
description: For over 30 years, small, independent craft brewpubs have been springing up across the U.S.A. to quench the thirst for distinctive, fresh, local beer. American craft beer - like the people who drink it - is all about taste, character, creativity, and individuality. Arbor Brewing Company is bringing that American brewing spirit to Bangalore because life is too short to drink bland beer!

name: Bistro Claytopia
description: Bangalore's first paint-your-own pottery studio and bistro Description Create your own masterpiece in four simple steps: You... Pick a piece (premoulded and heated white clay) - Choose your colours - Sketch your design - Paint it! We... Leave the rest to us. We glaze it and fire it for you. Your ceramic masterpiece is ready to be collected in 2 weeks Add a personal touch to your home decor, that gift for your loved one, or simply come and enjoy the perfect cup of coffee in our cozy cafe. Relax and paint while indulging in our delicious burgers, pastas, sandwiches, subs, salads, soups, all day breakfast, waffles, pancakes, desserts, coffees and more... We are also a popular venue for: Birthday parties Corporate events Charity Events Team building exercises Family parties Kitty parties School art sessions

That's when Steven Pinto quit his job in an IT firm to extend the hospitality of serving Mangalorean delicacies beyond his family and friends to the public who also loved seafood as much as he did. With well wishers who enjoyed the delicacies and Mangalore Pearl introducing many a forgotten recipes, the restaurant has become a household name among Mangaloreans in Bangalore in particular and seafood lovers in general. The Rogue Elephant has a simple and spacious ambiance and is ideal for Continental food lovers who like spending quality time with families and loved ones. Framed by the wind-cooled lobby of the hotel and the first sight to greet our patrons, the Lotus Pavilion is a celebration of all that ITC Gardenia stands for- the best of nature in an environment that expresses the best of human endeavor. The ideal sit-out restaurant – any time of the year, you can enjoy a fine line up of beverages from around the world, with a selection of gourmet tapas and hors d’oeuvres from our carefully crafted menu.

name: 13th Floor Lounge Bar
description: Feted, lauded, celebrated, copied but never duplicated...these words best describe the 13 plus year old journey of The 13th Floor. Although the more popular way most of our patrons describe The 13th Floor is ...The view ! The view !! Oh-my-God ....the view!!! Saying that The 13th floor is a cocktail lounge is like saying that a Single Malt Scotch is a drink made from barley and water. A space that allows you to unwind with colleagues after a tough work-day, have night out on the town with the girls, chill out with that significant someone or even conduct a business discussion over drinks. Vast open spaces that are clad in glass and brushed steel to give guests a fully undiluted, unobstructed view of Bangalore city at their feet with the star spangled sky above. Music is played at conversation level volumes and is a mix of retro pop and rock ballads and lounge mixes. The spanking new Cocktail Menu is a heady mix of the contemporary re-working of old standards and the tried and tested. A great wine list and their unique way of putting together great wine and champagne cocktails ensures that even first-time tipplers have something to raise their glasses with.

name: Imli Cafe and restaurant
description: "One of the nicest things about life is the way we must regularly stop whatever we are doing and devote our attention to eating."We heartily endorse this sentiment! But like a beautiful painting is enhanced by the perfect frame, a good meal must be savoured in the proper setting, with food not just for the belly, but also for the heart and the soul.So we created Imli. A home away from home, where beautiful art adorns the walls, delicious food sits on the table, and friendship and laughter fill the air…We serve delicious, healthy, pure vegetarian North Indian cuisine with an emphasis on quality ingredients cooked in a manner your mother would approve. Our recipes have been handed down through generations in our family and it is with pride that we share them with you.Come and visit us, and tell your friends.Oh, and did we mention, we serve the best garam chai in the area.

Shiro’s ability to stimulate your senses continues with their diverse cuisine and sophisticated bar. Inspired by the fiery orient, the menu offers an eclectic mix of Korean, Vietnamese, Chinese, Japanese and Thai gastronomy . Having won 19 awards across the country over the last eight years, including The Times Food Guide’s Best Pan Asian Restaurant in Bengaluru for the last four years consecutively, Shiro speaks for itself.

name: Loya
description: LOYA is a grand feast, which leads you on an immersive journey across the vivid north. From the foothills of the Himalayas to the flat terrain of Punjab, to snow-laden Kashmir, Loya is a confluence of flavour, passion and influence, all culminating exquisitely on your plate. Our search for the authentic and the long-preserved dishes resulted in a gathering of the North’s most cherished recipes. They spotlight the inherent uniqueness and theatrics of time-honoured cooking techniques of the North - the drama of “dhungar” or smoking, the aromatics of “baghar”, in which spices are tempered in hot oil, “dum”, the richness of slow-cooking and the energetic pounding of spices by hand. Loya offers the warmth and comfort of the past intersecting with the energy of today. A place where timeless techniques, undiscovered culinary traditions and heirloom ingredients are proudly showcased. Loya welcomes guests above the age of 08 years only.

name: Little Italy
description: Tucked away in the by-lanes near the Forum Mall, Koramangala is "Little Italy", the well-known fine dine Italian and Mexican speciality restaurant which has just completed four years and is now a landmark destination for all food lovers.Little Italy, Koramangala has a pleasant and cosy ambience overlooking natural greenery. The alfresco seating has few tables laid out under a skylight and lined with bamboo plants. White walls offset the deep brown furniture in the inside area, giving the restaurant a rather elegant and classy look. The evening mood is romantic with lantern bulb lighting accentuated by the unique interior setup. The well-stocked bar set in one of the corners offers imported/Indian liquor, wines & medley of cock-tails and mock-tails. The first floor is contemporary and plays host to get-togethers, candle-light dinners, kitty parties, birthday parties, Dance/DJ parties, cricket/football match projections on large screen. This exquisite place delivers thin crust pizzas baked in an open-view wood fire oven. Amongst the wide variety of pizzas ranging from the ever green "Margherita" to the extensively topped "Pizza Mellino", there exist some signature options like the "Calzone Al Forno" - a closed pizza. Going beyond the Pizzas are the Pastas... Based on Tomato, Cheese and Pesto sauces, and their intertwining combinations, pastas like "Pasta Barbaresca", “Pasta Del Barone”, “Masala Mafia” have become all time favourites.As pre-cursors, there are Zuppe(soups), Insalata(salads) and Anti-Pasti(starters). "Insalata Mista" has many fans, as have the Assorted platters, Bruschettas and Mexican starters - "Nachos with Cheese" and "Cheese corn balls". The melting “Cheese Fondue” is truly out of this world. The Lasagne's and Risotto's score well among the specialities. The tail end is held up by the excruciatingly mouth watering "Chocolate Bomb" - a melody of ice cream with overflowing chocolate. The cheesecakes, pancakes and dessert pizzas are a sinful delight for the sweet-toothed. The “Weekday Lunch Buffet” and “Sunday Brunch” with its sumptuous spread of Italian, Mexican, Mongolian and Lebanese fare is already a hit.In short, here’s a place well worth a visit and repeat visits...

It is known for its finest sea-food restaurant which known for serving authentic taste and brings the memory of Western-ghat cuisines. The menu is a seafood lover’s dream with serving an eclectic blend of Goan seafood, Maharashtrian delicacies, marvellous food from Kerala and Mangalorean dishes - cooked to perfection. It is this exotic mix that works best for our seafood restaurant. Sana-di-ge is an absolute essential and a must-try for lovers of seafood. Usage of brass at Sana-di-ge in a new level—from welcome lamp to the utensils used. The food gets served in brass plates lined with banana leaf to make South Indian dining more authentic.

name: Karavalli @ Taj
description: Karavalli an iconic restaurant located at Vivanta Bengaluru Residency Road. Since inception in 1990, Karavalli has grown to be an institution when it comes to South west coast flavours. Modelled on a traditional Mangalorean bungalow, and surrounded by lush tamarind trees, the restaurant is inspired by the architecture of coastal South India. Ingredients from the coast, such as cloves, cinnamon, pepper, home grown chillies and only the freshest vegetables and finest meats make it to the menu. The chef and team have painstakingly preserved India’s most refined culinary traditions from our rich heritage by restoring age old recipes, decades of researching meeting with locals and recreating forgotten flavours of a glorious bygone era.

Shakesbierre has a vibrant ambience​ that transports you to the era of Shakespeare plays. This is a place where time takes a break from ticking and makes you enjoy a signature cocktail and thin Roman bread. The wide and open space, decor steeped in Victorian subtleties and a menu that could give Hamlet a run for its money when it comes to the sheer depth and length of it, ShakesBierre is midsummer’s night dream come true - for the foodies, drink enthusiasts & partygoers of Bengaluru.

Prepared in an open kitchen by expert chefs utilizing celebrated traditional methods, these amazing creations which captivate and enchant your palate while plated, contemporary desserts and sweets promise a memorable conclusion to every meal. Adjoining the main dining area, an intimate Whisky table and the wine enoteca visitors with tasting tables at which to explore these distinctive satisfactions; unforgettably innovative cocktails—each inspired by indigenous herbs, spices and fruits—complete the restaurants distinctive beverage selection. description: Inspired from the traditional kitchens of the Arab,Persian-descended Navayathi people, the authentic and delectable recipes have passed down the ages and tantalizingly await you at Alibaba. Savour wonderful dishes from a plethora of Middle Eastern cuisines like Navayathi, Arabian, Iranian, Lebanese, Mediterranean, Moroccan and Persian and wash it down with your drinks all the while swaying to intoxicating Arabic songs. Take your pick from the sumptuous meat dishes to the exotic fresh fish or the mouth-watering steam-cooked Bhatkali Biryani to the riches of vegetarian fare. What will also captivate you is the distinctive ambience inspired from the Arabian Nights. Marhaba!

cuisine: French Cafe Fast Food European Street Food
description: Paris Panini brings you the best of french-style sandwiches in India. Born in France, Nicolas moved to India after years of experience with French cuisine. Missing his sandwiches back home he decided to experiment, and soon after started a food truck (under the name Le Casse Croute) aiming to bring gourmet french street food to Bangalore. His vision was pretty simple, serve homemade, high-quality street food using premium ingredients from across India and Europe following traditional French recipes. After rebranding to Paris Panini in 2019, Nicolas, AB and Nikhil kept the same values and worked on a more elaborate menu to give you the most authentic experience as if you were seating in a Parisian cafe.

name: Purnabramha Maharashtrian Restaurant
description: At Purnabramha, we understand this great gift that we humans are endowed with. Hence we bring to you one of the finest, oldest and the most complete food culture in world from Maharashtra, the most industrialized state of India. We believe "Food is Purnabramha". Conceptualizing and realizing the same belief in Purnabramha, we bring to you one of the best food for everyone's joy, served with warm hearted tradition. We at Purnabramha are largely influenced by people who are missing Maharashtrian food in all non-Marathi regions like namma Bangalore. At the same time we also aim at introducing highly nutritious Maharashtra cuisine to our non-Maharashtrian brethren. We are making Purnabramha memorable not only for its subtle variety and strong flavours, but also because of the legendary hospitality of Maharashtrian. That is why we say that we are serving culture along with the food.

It brings to mind the greatness of the Roman empire and the excellence demanded but it's rulers, it connotes tables overflowing with delicacies and viands from all over the world, it tells of people whose cultural standards have yet to be eclipsed. Above all, it speaks of elegance unequaled. We have tried to maintain this image over the years and balanced it with our very own brand of simplicity. In Bangalore, we invite you to partake this delightful mix of quality and courtesy, of good food and good music, and all the other little extras that makes dining with us an experience ! In short, we give you.... CAESARS Elegantly Simple......Simply Elegant..

name: Karnatic
description: The Carnatic is the stuff of folklore, wherein it is one of the mightiest kingdoms that ever graced the face of the Earth! A kingdom that united all of the South Indian provinces! This kingdom was not only known for its ferocity but was also treasured as a haven for great cuisine! The birthplace of dishes which are the true embodiment of our culture and which radiates our essence! Come witness the resurrection of the cuisine which hypnotized and encapsulated the world with its mouthwatering taste and set a benchmark for the invention of a new cuisine in the heart of Bangalore! If there ever was ​heaven for food then this place is Nirvana! Indulge in the cuisine which takes you back to your roots and revel in the nostalgia! Drop by to taste the legacy of South India!

The Ambience at Platform 65 will set you in a nostalgic mood and ensures you feel like you are actually traveling on a train.

Punjab Grill has a presence of 21 outlets across the globe. 16 of these outlets are in India, international presence include Singapore, Bangkok, Jeddah, Abu Dhabi & Washington DC. name: Raahi Neo Kitchen & Bar
description: RAAHI Neo Kitchen & Bar Raahi is the caravan of gastronomic beauty and inspiration. It is a humble amalgamation of regional ingredients, culinary aesthetics and bold innovation. Raahi is the story of our journey of continuous hunger, expeditions of new cuisines and ingredients which reflects in our constantly evolving menu..We at Raahi closely work with native ingredients and create a sensory food experience. Taking inspiration from nature, our cocktail menu is based on The Panch Tattva's (five elements) made using indigenous ingredients and quality alcohol.These unique set of cocktails are supported by redefined classics made by our well-travelled bar experts. A dedicated section of non-alcoholic drinks comprises of reinvented regional drinks and infusions. All the above is backed with techniques including flavor extraction using rotary evaporator, Controlled pressure & temperature cooking, Fermentation, Smoke penetration, Wood fire,Salt Curing, Dehydration & Vacuum drying.

Opus, known to Bangaloreans, Goans, music lovers and party goers as the most fun place to be at,has made a comeback in a slightly new avatar, and in an all new location. Though the saying 'Bigger Than Ever' may sound cliche, with us it's a fact! Opus is now located at Harlur Road ( Off Sarjapur Road ) and comprises of 5 different options. Each option is dedicated to each of the five sections - Terrace, Club, Fine Dining, Banquet, and an outdoor restaurant reminiscent of the old Opus. Take your pick according to your mood. description: Beer Garden. Fine Dining. Contemporary Restaurant. Café. Craft beer fresh from a microbrewery. If these are what you have been looking for, then look no further. Barleyz is there in the heart of Bangalore to tantalize your taste buds and appeal to the beer connoisseur in you. Explore a world of culinary and gastronomic delights across five unique genres of dining and entertainment in the heart of Koramangala, the hippest destination in Bangalore, spread over 30,000 square feet on two floors. We understand that a night out with friends is a bit different from a day out with the family. We bring to you the pleasures and intimacy from the beer gardens of Bavaria to our roof-top Beer Garden. Beer drinking is all about having a chilled-out time with your friends, family or even enjoying it yourself. It is about relaxation, about cooling the heels after the daily grind. Indulge in our craft beers at the Microbrewery, immersing in the music of your choice set within contemporary interiors blended with the cosmopolitan and chic outlook of the city of Bangalore. Come over with your loved ones for that special family time at our Indian fine dining restaurant, replete with live counters where our chefs would attend to your discerning desires for the perfect taste. What’s more, you can enjoy your meal while your kids enjoy in our spacious and colourful Play Area with a kids’ menu to bring that smile and happiness on their faces.

name: Habba Kadal Kashmiri Heritage Hub
description:
Habba Kadal, the bridge that leads us home to a place where an ancient, refined culture once flourished. Join us, as we share that serendipitous experience of legendary hospitality and soulful abundance infused by the aromas, sights and sounds of that flower of Human civilization- Kashmir.
It’s where we stumbled before we walked, scraped our knees playing Cricket in alleys, broke windows, got liberal doses of “Soi-shalakh”, (traditional disciplinary treatment!) from elders when we were amiss.
That Bridge awaits the Return of its Natives. That Journey back commences here……………..in Spirit and Soul.
Our Credo? Respect Origins.

name: Tangerine Sizzlers & More
description: If you are fascinated by the sensory effects that a sizzler induces with its happy, crackling sound followed by its heady aroma, then Tangerine is just the place to visit. Creating its own niche with a loyal client base, this restaurant has been in town for the last six years and has won it a prominent place in the city's food map. Tangerine, the quintessential Sizzler restaurant is back with its recipe for the Perfect Sizzler..hissing, sputtering, spewing aromatic fumes and hot as hell!!Recently re-locating to an enviable location in South Bangalore - Kormanagala, Tangerine serves piping hot Sizzlers with carefully chosen flavors, textures, ingredients and prides itself in making every dish unique. While Sizzlers are the centre piece here, with a large variety to choose from, Tangerine offers an exhaustive fusion continental menu that includes a little something for everyone, be it the Salad & Soups for the Health junkies, the famous Pastas, their delicious innovations of the Sizzlers or the indulgent must try Desserts.A well designed restaurant with decor that's minimal yet eye catching, Tangerine is the brainchild of Arun and Manjula Rao and like its counterpart in Chennai, it proposes to highlight art and culture, as it serves a platform to renowned as well as young artists to showcase their individual pursuits - however modest or ambitious in scale.Symbolic for taking the concept of Sizzlers to an all new level, Tangerine reflects a sophisticated earthy ambience, with tasteful music and warm hospitality that blend together to create a delightful sensory journey making it a must visit for the good food lovers.

name: Nandhini Restaurant Jayanagar
description: The Andhra Culinary Tradition The celebrated Andhra Cuisine is a product of many rich influences like the glorious history and culture of its zestful and vigorous land. It has its roots in the Southern cooking tradition with each of Andhra Pradesh’s three regions namely-the Coast, Rayalseema and the Telangana having their own distinctive cooking styles. The Nawabs brought with them the Deccani style of cooking which drew influences from the Mughlai cuisine. As time passed the two cooking traditions influenced each other leading to the culmination of the Andhra fare as we know it today. While the fiery chillies and peppers and the staple use of rice in the cuisine can be attributed to the original Southern style of cooking, the dollops of ghee, use of fresh fruits instead of dried ones and the non-vegetarian specialities are all typical Nawabi traits. All in all there is no dearth of variety for foodies as far as Andhra cuisine is concerned. Whether it’s the traditional Andhra meal served on a plantain leaf with the quintessentially spicy & tangy vegetable sambhars, gravies, Avakkai, Gongura pickles and chutneys to be relished with rice, or the mouthwatering array of biriyanis, top of the list being the Hyderabadi Biriyani, the kebabs, kormas, khichris or kulchas Andhra cuisine is a lip-smacking treat all the way.

name: Authentic Andhra Restaurant
description: ANDHRA PRADESH CUISINE (TELUGU CUISINE) The state of Andhra Pradesh is one of the leaders in many fronts and has been witnessing rapid growth in all spheres. The location of the state puts it in the centre of the country and it is reckoned as the gateway to south india. It touches the bay of bengal on the east and is washed by the rivers Godavari, Krishna and Tungabhadra. It covers the plateau of the northern deccan hills. It was part of the madras state before 1953. It is bordered by odisha, chhattisgarh, maharashtra , tamil nadu and karnataka. The state of andhra pradesh has a rich cultural heritage and cuisine which was influenced by the rulers and emerged to be a political power during the reign of the Mauryan dynasty and was a flourishing empire of the satavahanas from times before christ. name: All Saints Bakery Bangalore
description: All Saints was founded in 1969 by Thomas Vellara, a passionate young baker in his early twenties at the quieter side of Brigade Road, Bangalore. The bakery soon became popular for it's fresh hand made bread and traditional plum cakes. Over the years the bakery has evolved and grown with the city, catering to Bangalore's traditional tastes and palettes. The Bakery now manged by the second generation along with their children now churns out savories and pastries unique to All Saints. Some of the popular must try items include Sugar doughnuts, mutton samosa, puffs, plum cake apart from the ever popular wide varieties of bread and cakes. The secret to the bakery's success is grounded in principles that Mr. Vellara himself lived by: • Produce a quality product at a reasonable price • Emphasize excellent customer service

name: Liber
cuisine: Italian Indian Bar Pizza Thai Pub
description: Liber restobar symbolizes the very essence of Liber Pater. The restobar is an icon of classy, glamourous and yet fun and inviting service. The tri-level restobar is located at the crown of 100 ft road in Indiranagar. Situated right at the crossroads of 12th Main and 100ft Road, Liber is the epitome of glamorous and sexy chill out style of start-up millennia. The highlight of Liber is the spatial simplicity. Enveloped in 3 floors at the iconic Sony Junction, it has rustic ambience of brick masonry wall and contrasting woodwork glass and metal finishing, Liber has a classy, chic, yet rustic finish. The entire restaurant is open to the cool and lusty weather that Bengaluru is famous for. The 3 floors are an example of aesthetic experimentation and ergonomically practical design. The old shell of the building is supplemented by the retro furniture in a rustic setting of the evening Bangalore shades. A curved staircase, which also doubles up as a hangout zone leads upto the second floor, giving way to the centre piece, the island bar of Liber. The second floor contrasts the retro first floor with modern and chic interiors. Not to be undone, the open air rooftop, brings out a lazy Mediterranean personality. Perfect spot for an early evening or a late brunch enjoying the cool breeze, the rooftop boasts of a pizzeria and a Charcoal grill. The music is a heady infusion of 50s-tinged vocals splashed with 60s rhythms and 70s electronics that blend seamlessly into each other as the evening progresses and are perfectly synchronized to create the right effect. The bar enlists a carefully curated selection of Beers, Malts, Spirits and Wines from the world over, both classic and contemporary, and the extensive cocktails list includes classical concoctions as well as post liberalization contemporaries. Liber pays tribute to the swinging start-up times, an era that saw 100 feet Road become the High Street of Bangalore with the largest concentration of Nightlife, Restaurants and Retail in the country. Welcome to Liber - rewind, reboot, restart...in your own space..at your own pace.

name: The Warehouse
cuisine: Italian Chinese American Indian Bar Thai Pub
description: The Warehouse, a product of KP Groups, located at the prime Indiranagar 80ft road, provides you a particularly raw and laid back vibe, inspired by the casual bars and music destinations across the world. With lot of success stories - The Beach, Blistering Barnacles, The Island, 380Down, Banana Beach bar, The Vil'age, The H2O, ZeroG, The 5th Element Spa, and THE WAREHOUSE is the new vibe created and presented to Bangalore by KP Groups. The Warehouse, pub layout: Open Air - Outdoor section with a 90ft Island bar, Happy tunes, casual seating areas and Basketball/Volleyball section, provides a perfect ambiance to "chill" for regulars over a variety of speciality cocktails and multi cuisine food. This section is the buzz of The Warehouse, with the open air being Bangalore's favorite set up. Watch out for the "signs" to avoid hurting yourself. Upper Stage - This is the restricted section of The Warehouse, which is accessible only at specific time during the week. The Upper Stage turns into a club on weekends and day of special events and has the potential of becoming notoriously famous, with the range of reputed DJs from across the country, spinning their tunes. Please keep an eye on The Warehouse Notice Board for the roster of artists and live acts. Underground - This section is the personal favourite of the Warehouse Handlers, as the most most valuable things are stored here. Covered by wooden interiors, the basement provides the experiences of underground parties with a broad range of bands and live acts by guest artists - Electronic to Rock.

name: Paris Panini - Gourmet Sandwiches and Wraps
description: Paris Panini brings you the best of french-style sandwiches in India. Born in France, Nicolas moved to India after years of experience with French cuisine. Missing his sandwiches back home he decided to experiment, and soon after started a food truck (under the name Le Casse Croute) aiming to bring gourmet french street food to Bangalore. His vision was pretty simple, serve homemade, high-quality street food using premium ingredients from across India and Europe following traditional French recipes. After rebranding to Paris Panini in 2019, Nicolas, AB and Nikhil kept the same values and worked on a more elaborate menu to give you the most authentic experience as if you were seating in a Parisian cafe.

name: Linoui
description: L'inouï, a brand by Chowdaiah Enterprise, is a premium Bangalore based Chocolaterie that specializes in pure Belgian and Swiss cocoa butter chocolates. French for something unexpectedly delightful, L'inouï is a little over a year old and already boasts a loyal following among Bangalore's chocolate connoisseurs. L'inouï is also the official Chocolaterie for Audi India since December 2014. Based on authentic European recipes, and made from only the purest ingredients sourced from the world over (almonds from California, fruit purees from Europe, coffee from our lovely Chikmaglur and more), L'inouï 's chocolates contain NO vegetable oil or added preservatives. Our products use only pure Belgian & Swiss couverture chocolate, which allow our signature hot chocolates, truffles, macarons, and pastries to retain both a rich, smooth texture and authenticity of heritage. None of our chocolates contain egg, perfect for vegetarians looking to indulge their sweet tooth. Our Master chefs, who have previously worked with renowned star hotels, constantly innovate and expand our menu, and we're proud to be the first Chocolaterie in Bangalore to introduce our now signature hot chocolate sticks, as well as the Chocolate Bombe. Our 72% extra dark chocolate products also command a religious fan following among connoisseurs.

name: Paris Panini - Gourmet Sandwiches & Wraps
description: Paris Panini brings you the best of french-style sandwiches in India. Born in France, Nicolas moved to India after years of experience with French cuisine. Missing his sandwiches back home he decided to experiment, and soon after started a food truck (under the name Le Casse Croute) aiming to bring gourmet french street food to Bangalore. His vision was pretty simple, serve homemade, high-quality street food using premium ingredients from across India and Europe following traditional French recipes. After rebranding to Paris Panini in 2019, Nicolas, AB and Nikhil kept the same values and worked on a more elaborate menu to give you the most authentic experience as if you were seating in a Parisian cafe.

A multi-cuisine eatery, Sea Rock is best known for its authentic Mangalorean fare, and for many diners, it is the place to indulge in Mangalorean seafood specialties. name: Monkey Bar
description: Guess who's back? Back again! Monkey is back. Tell a friend! Only this time we’re Edgy-ier...Vibe-ier...Booz-ier! In 2012, Monkey Bar kick-started India’s gastropub revolution. Now we’re back to create more Monkey madness. Our newly imagined gastropub of today promises a delicious culinary adventure (don’t worry, our beloved burgers are still on the menu), great cocktails and everything else that makes for a fun time out. In our menu, you’ll find regional food from India sitting pretty next to favourites from across the world; and street food from ‘patli gullies’ holding their own against culinary gems discovered down narrow lanes across the planet. Our drinks menu is inspired by popular Indian bevs, indigenous flavours and a strong zero waste philosophy. Featuring peru and chilli chaat, murabba, sharbat, cutting chai, queen pineapple, fruit leathers, and salts, our new bar menu is a standing ovation to all things cocktail. #GoBananas

name: Wink
description: Exudes vibes of fun and playfulness with a dash of wit. With a range of interesting cocktails and relaxing music, WINK helps you to unwind. The place where you come to network, unwind, party and enjoy an evening out. The beverage menu has been carefully curated by mixologists using house-made mixes and syrups and unusual ingredients that and would tempt you into staying back after hours to watch the lounge bar transition into a party. Ask our talented Bartenders to pair the perfect food menu for a marriage of flavours and textures. From sundown to midnight, this is the most popular place to be.
localAddress: 66 Residency Road, Vivanta Bengaluru, 560025

name: Venezia
cuisine: Italian American Pizza Fast Food Arabic
description: Venezia, Jayanagar’s latest food jaunt is all set to open its doors for customers to enjoy a true fine dining Italian experience. With a quaint Salad bar nestled in a green oasis on the ground floor, vintage inspired fine dining rooms and an open aired rooftop terrace, Venezia caters to every mood. The warmth and vibrancy of the decor is reflected in our carefully curated menu. The highly skilled chef’s take you on a culinary journey through the streets and cafes of Italy. Choose between indulgent Italian dishes, vibrant Mexican snacks and select flavourful treats from the east. The delectable meals with a focus on home-style, comfort foods are perfect for the Indian taste buds. For the first time in south Bangalore Venezia offers a range of healthy, fresh and mouth-watering salads that you simply cannot miss. We invite diners to join us for an exceptional culinary experience starting early April.

name: The Diner Restobar
description: Ultimate destination for a delightful dining experience in the heart of Whitefield. Nestled in the bustling area of ITPL amidst the thriving tech parks and companies, our casual yet elegant establishment offers a perfect blend of a bar and restaurant, ensuring an unforgettable time for every guest with budget friendly prices. We take pride in our diverse and exquisite menu that caters to a wide range of palates. Whether you crave the rich flavors of South Indian cuisine, the aromatic delights of North Indian dishes, the savory notes of Chinese delicacies, the charred perfection of Tandoori preparations, or the classic tastes of Continental fare - we have it all! Also, indulge in our wide selection of draught and craft beers, liquors, cocktails, and mocktails to complement your meal and enhance your overall experience.

name: Barbecue by Punjab Grill
description: Punjab Grill takes its guests on a culinary journey into the grandeur of the Royal State of undivided Punjab. Diners experience an exploration of wonderful diversity of the Frontier Food and the rich streams of Hindu, Sikh, Pathan and Punjabi cuisine. Punjab Grill promises an exquisite dining experience to all its patrons with an array of culinary delights that is aromatic and flavourful. Authentic preparations and sumptuous spread of succulent fare from kebabs and curries to a selection of dessert is an evocative representation of rich culinary tradition. The style of cooking requires incredible aptitude with respect to the gourmet specialists, since the meat is not accompanied by any sauce, but rather is just pre-marinated and cooked before serving.

description: At TGIN - Thank God It's Nutritious, our vision is to lead the way in revolutionizing how people perceive and experience nutritious eating. We aim to start with cloud kitchens and build a trusted brand that our target group relies on for high-quality, protein-rich meals that nourish the body and delight the taste buds. Driven by our commitment to health and convenience, we envision a future where everyone has easy access to delicious and wholesome food options that support a balanced lifestyle. Our name, "Thank God It's Nutritious," reflects our belief in the power of homegrown ingredients and the art of balancing nutrition. We curate recipes and employ the best chefs to ensure that every meal contributes positively to your health and well-being, because we truly believe that "you are what you eat." name: Biryani By Kilo - Hebbal
description:
At Biryani By Kilo, our Handi biryani is slow Dum-cooked using the choicest of ingredients, made fresh only on order. We deliver/serve Biryani in the same Handi in which it is Dum cooked on order to lock the delicious flavors, aromas & taste. BBK Kebabs, curries, breads & other Indian classical dishes are top notch too. 
In today’s fast-paced world, we need to slow down and enjoy life’s precious moments, especially food. We believe that food must be relished with fursat, in every bite. So when you dig in to our food, it’s “Fursat Wala Yum, Dum Dumma Dum Dum”.' 
We have 100+ outlets in 45+ cities and can be ordered through website, App, Call Centre (1800-212-2-212).

name: MiPi Lounge
cuisine: Italian Indian Barbecue Thai Wine Bar
description: The stylish country lounge and Wine Tavern that serves Italian, Thai, Tandoor cuisine, and Barbeque is a unique and exciting dining experience that combines traditional and modern-day elements. As you enter the lounge, you'll notice the rustic decor that exudes a cozy and inviting atmosphere, with choice of seating on deck, back lawn or air conditioned comfortable seating arrangements. The lounge's Italian cuisine is a treat for the taste buds, with an extensive selection of dishes that feature fresh ingredients and authentic flavors. From classic pastas and pizzas to mouth-watering vegetarian and non-vegetarian dishes, you'll find something to satisfy your cravings. For those who enjoy the bold flavors of Thai cuisine, the lounge offers a range of dishes that incorporate aromatic herbs, spices, and exotic ingredients. Whether you prefer spicy curries, stir-fries, or soups, the Thai menu has something to suit every palate. The Tandoor cuisine is another highlight of the lounge, featuring traditional Indian dishes that are cooked in a clay oven. The Tandoor oven imparts a unique smoky flavor and tenderness to the meats and vegetables, resulting in delicious dishes such as kebabs, naan bread, and biryanis. Overall, the lounge restaurant provides a delightful culinary experience that combines a warm and welcoming ambiance with an eclectic mix of cuisines and choice of Wines. Whether you're in the mood for Italian, Thai, Tandoor, or barbeque, you're sure to find something to love at this unique dining destination.

We specialize in providing healthy & delicious food options that are "free from Wheat, Maida, & Refined White Sugar". ​As creators of Gluten-free, Vegan, & Millet products, our product categories are diverse. From bakery to sweetshop, flours & blends, rawas/ sooji, instant mixes and snack bars, our brand seems to cater to a wide range of dietary needs and preferences, across geographies and cultures. All tasks from procurement, to processing, milling, sieving, preparing, baking, labeling, to packaging, are undertaken by us under one single roof in our exclusive gluten-free facility located at Singanayakanahalli, Yelahanka, Bengaluru - 560064. Our facility also houses a store front, to welcome walk-in customers a unique experience with freshly made "Ready to eat" and "Ready to cook" products. ​ We are elated to share that we are a "millet atta chakki with a startup India recognition".

name: Biryani By Kilo - Sarjapur
description:
At Biryani By Kilo, our Handi biryani is slow Dum-cooked using the choicest of ingredients, made fresh only on order. We deliver/serve Biryani in the same Handi in which it is Dum cooked on order to lock the delicious flavors, aromas & taste. BBK Kebabs, curries, breads & other Indian classical dishes are top notch too. 
In today’s fast-paced world, we need to slow down and enjoy life’s precious moments, especially food. We believe that food must be relished with fursat, in every bite. So when you dig in to our food, it’s “Fursat Wala Yum, Dum Dumma Dum Dum”.' 
We have 100+ outlets in 45+ cities and can be ordered through website, App, Call Centre (1800-212-2-212).

We deliver/serve Biryani in the same Handi in which it is Dum cooked on order to lock the delicious flavors, aromas & taste. BBK Kebabs, curries, breads & other Indian classical dishes are top notch too. 
In today’s fast-paced world, we need to slow down and enjoy life’s precious moments, especially food. We believe that food must be relished with fursat, in every bite. So when you dig in to our food, it’s “Fursat Wala Yum, Dum Dumma Dum Dum”.' 
We have 100+ outlets in 45+ cities and can be ordered through website, App, Call Centre (1800-212-2-212).
localAddress: 34;Biryani By Kilo, Shop no. 212, Prestige Plaza,, Chikkabommansandra, Yelahanka New Town,, 560064

description: Offering an Eastern soul to the Western plates - we bring you our own mouth-watering recipes, right here in Virginia. Whether you are a classic-pizza lover or an adventurous taste-traveler, we have something for you. Our menu offers classic Italian pizzas with all the glamour of the Mediterranean; and yet, if you are slightly more daring, we can offer you a trip to the magical heard of India, it's colorful life, and enchanting soul - all in one slice. Whether it's our Tandoori Pizza, Tikka Pizza or Tandoori Wings, our Indian Speciality Pizzas are topped with the most delicious ingredients of Indian cuisine. At Pizza 360, the East and West do meet; and the result? A world on a crust, and a smile on your face.

name: MITTI Cafe
description: We’re Mitti Cafe, a chain of inclusive cafes, completely run by our team of people with disabilities. Mitti is a non-profit organization, that provides experiential training and employment to adults with physical, intellectual, and psychiatric disabilities, coming from low-income families. Our focus is economic independence for all.​ We create visible, tangible, high impact livelihood models of inclusion through interactive cafes and outreach initiatives that the community is inspired to take part in and be a part of. Our food menu is curated keeping in mind your health and taste. Vegan, Gluten free options available. We serve world cuisine in a healthy avatar. We also have a beautiful studio space for events and activities.

name: The Rising Dough
description: At Rising Dough Special Things Come Small. We create gourmet bite size preludes and sensational dessert experiences. We use the best ingredients to make the most delicious preludes and desserts you've ever eaten. We believe that eating small is sophisticated. Most of our delicacies are individual servings which you can serve to your guest with style and ease. Take time to look into our menu and order for your party. If you have anything in mind that is not in the menu, we can help you with it. Just give us a call. Why cater for your parties with us? Parties are social events, and you want to maximize the time you spend with your guests, This is where The Rising Dough will fill a place at your parties. Our selections are planned and crafted into neat individual servings to save you time and energy in organizing the party food. All you have to do is, place these on your serving dishes and viola. The desserts come in stylish individual serving containers which you can offer to your guests in style and ease without worrying about the decoration on the dessert going sloppy. Baby Showers, Birthdays, Graduations, Valentines, Mother's Day, Father's Day, Coming of Age, Engagements, Anniversaries, Holidays, Just Because and Special Events are some of the occasions and milestones that will become lives unforgettable memories. The Rising Dough is here to help you make these moments memorable. Look at our MENU and place your order with us.

name: Drunken Monkey
description: Drunken Monkey offers over 200 types of Smoothies and Smoothie Bowls made from specially blended combinations of fruits like fresh tropical watermelon to exotic dragon fruits, from healthy green spinach to juicy kiwis, from dry fruits like figs, dates to nuts like cashews, almonds and hazelnuts. These smoothies are further enhanced with healthy seasonings like sunflower seeds, pumpkin seeds, chia and basil seeds. All the monkey blends are completely natural and fresh with zero addition of any artificial flavors or sugar or preservatives or any kind of concentrates. The monkey believes that nature has a lot to offer to us and strives in creating unique and delicious smoothie blends that are both functional and fun-ranging from detox to meal replacements, from hydrators to protein smoothies, and from healthy veggie smoothies to hangover warriors. Every single smoothie at drunken monkey is specially crafted with precision and love, delivering you a perfectly blended smoothie which is delicious, yummy and of great nutritional value. Every sip leaves you feeling light, happy and ' naturally high' , and the only secret to it is simple and straightforward - embrace life, embrace nature and 'stay naturally high’.

name: Biryani By Kilo - Lulu Global Malls
description:
At Biryani By Kilo, our Handi biryani is slow Dum-cooked using the choicest of ingredients, made fresh only on order. We deliver/serve Biryani in the same Handi in which it is Dum cooked on order to lock the delicious flavors, aromas & taste. BBK Kebabs, curries, breads & other Indian classical dishes are top notch too. 
In today’s fast-paced world, we need to slow down and enjoy life’s precious moments, especially food. We believe that food must be relished with fursat, in every bite. So when you dig in to our food, it’s “Fursat Wala Yum, Dum Dumma Dum Dum”.' 
We have 100+ outlets in 45+ cities and can be ordered through website, App, Call Centre (1800-212-2-212).

name: Biryani By Kilo - HSR Layout
description:
At Biryani By Kilo, our Handi biryani is slow Dum-cooked using the choicest of ingredients, made fresh only on order. We deliver/serve Biryani in the same Handi in which it is Dum cooked on order to lock the delicious flavors, aromas & taste. BBK Kebabs, curries, breads & other Indian classical dishes are top notch too. 
In today’s fast-paced world, we need to slow down and enjoy life’s precious moments, especially food. We believe that food must be relished with fursat, in every bite. So when you dig in to our food, it’s “Fursat Wala Yum, Dum Dumma Dum Dum”.' 
We have 100+ outlets in 45+ cities and can be ordered through website, App, Call Centre (1800-212-2-212).

name: Biryani By Kilo - Kammanahalli
description:
At Biryani By Kilo, our Handi biryani is slow Dum-cooked using the choicest of ingredients, made fresh only on order. We deliver/serve Biryani in the same Handi in which it is Dum cooked on order to lock the delicious flavors, aromas & taste. BBK Kebabs, curries, breads & other Indian classical dishes are top notch too. 
In today’s fast-paced world, we need to slow down and enjoy life’s precious moments, especially food. We believe that food must be relished with fursat, in every bite. So when you dig in to our food, it’s “Fursat Wala Yum, Dum Dumma Dum Dum”.' 
We have 100+ outlets in 45+ cities and can be ordered through website, App, Call Centre (1800-212-2-212).

name: North Rasoi By Chef Pillai
description: Welcome to the chef life travel diary of “North Rasoi”! North Rasoi is a mystery on the menu of chef Suresh Pillai travel diary from across the globe to get connected with the nature. His chef life footprint takes him to the streets, countryside, farms, forest, mountains, and beaches. This menu brings a variety of him. experience and diverse flavors inspire from modern Indian progressive cuisine and gastronomy essence Collated through his journey. all the places he has been discovered during his travel around the world. In 2005, he joined the veeraswamy restaurant at London. He then moved as a sous chef at purple poppadom in Cardiff and later as Head chef at cinnamon culture, Gymkhana, Hoppers and Darbaar restaurant in London. He has been a guest lecturer and guest chef at University of the Bahamas in its culinary and Hospitality Management institute. In 2021, he started his own restaurant branded Restaurant chef pillai in Bengaluru known as RCP Hospitality Pvt.ltd.,
